So Many Toys, So Little Money

Posted on Sunday, December 18, 2005

I've spent the last few days doing research on new gear for this winter. I've come to a few conclusions. 1. - Arc'Teryx rocks. They're the "new" Patagonia. 2. - Lib Tech's Magne-Traction is pretty sweet. 3. - I want a RomeDesign. Over and out.
